amendment.description: Requiring estimates of certain decreases in Federal revenues for periods after the decrease is sunset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 838 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 838 proposed by Senator Harkin. (consideration: CR S7112-7114; text: CR S7113) Requiring estimates of certain decreases in Federal revenues for periods after the decrease is sunset.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 838 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 838 proposed by Senator Harkin.
